title: Import Table Data for Transport in Numbers
text: tinScrape package made several functions focuses : webscraping information downloadable hyperlinks GOV.UK extracting information Excel worksheets transforming data tables tidy format, long format automating migration data stored Google Cloud Storage (GCS) buckets BigQuery (BQ) package complements supports development maintenance Department Transport’s currently internal-facing website - Transport Numbers (TiN).

title: Import Table Data for Transport in Numbers
text: Currently, tinScrape made following main functions: extract_table_urls gcp_to_bq scrape_dynamic_methodology scrape_orr_tables

Download the cover sheet from a published table — download_cover
text: df_name string representing name table downloaded. function look tables specified GCS bucket match string (case-insensitive). bucket_name string representing name GCS bucket table downloaded. Default `"tin_dev_data_storage"`.

title: Download the cover sheet from a published table — download_cover
text: tibble containing two types metadata: - Emails: rows containing email addresses found cover sheet. - Dates: rows containing date information found cover sheet. cover sheet found, tibble contain `NA` values columns `info`, `text`, `source`.
